title: Need some help to identify Sans Serif Font...
content:
Hello all,  
I was hoping someone might be able to identify this sans serif typeface?

I have done my own searches and can't find anything too similar.  
Any help would be much appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131075924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SansType_4606.jpg)
author: spike

comments.content: I think this is Engravers Gothic.

Hey Chris,  
yes, I think that is it. I think it might have been alittle customised though.

Thanks so much!
Or [ITC Blair](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131075924/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1UW) which comes free with AppleWorks 6, supplied with current iMacs.
